Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music using content identification or fingerprinting.
#G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music based on my profile.
#G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music based on other users similar to myself.
Action: Search Music On Similar, Other Users To
Discover Music On Similar, Other Users To

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music or ringback tones similar to a given music video based on content similarity.
Action: Search Similar Ringback Tone To A Given Music Video On Content Similarity

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to search and discover music by exploiting enriched metadata and image tags, so that I find related artists, new genre, or other relevant listening path.
#G28# As a user, I want to upload tagged videos and have tags available for all further processing steps.
Action: Have Available Tags For All Further Processing Steps

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to view thumbnail sequences of video segments.
Action: View Thumbnail Sequences Of Video Segments

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to get info about similar video items and segments.
Action: Get Info About Similar Video Items

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to get info about perceptually similar video items and segments.
Action: Get Info About Perceptually Similar Video Items

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to receive content recommendations from similar profiles.
Action: Receive Content Recommendations From Similar Profiles

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to receive content recommendations based on most relevant news events in my area.
Action: Receive Content Recommendations On Most Relevant News Events In Area

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify persons in videos, and receive related information about them.
Action: Receive Related Information About Persons In Videos

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify products in videos, and receive related information about them.
Action: Receive Related Information About Products In Videos

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify broadcaster logos in videos, and receive related information about them.
Action: Receive Related Information About Broadcaster Logos In Videos

Text: #G28# As a user, I want to identify brands in videos, and receive related information about them.
#G28# As a user, I want to take a picture or upload an image, so that I am recommended with videos related to that picture or image.
#G28# As a user, I want to walk around, access content using a geographical map and be informed if there are videos covering the area, monuments or any other relevant point of interest.
#G28# As a user, I want to search content items using automatic speech recognition.
#G28# As an admin, I want to see, validate and edit segmentation of videos.
#G28# As an admin, I want to annotate news video segments and extract a topic for each segment.
Action: Extract A Topic For Each Segment

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to filter and rank videos based on A/V quality aspects.
Action: Filter Videos On A Quality Aspects
Rank Videos On A Quality Aspects

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to get a quick assessment of whether audio material has been edited before the upload.
Action: Get A Quick Assessment Audio Material Has Edited Before The Upload

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to prefilter nudity content.
#G28# As an admin, I want to prefilter content using search based on low-level asset information.
Action: Prefilter On Low Level Asset Information

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to automatically validated the ingested contents for copyright infringement.
Action: Validated The Ingested Contents For Copyright Infringement

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to prefilter the content using search on high-level asset information such as metadata and tags either recognized by the system of provided by the user.
Action: Prefilter The Content Using Search On High

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to assess how interesting or appealing or complex a picture is based on automated analysis, citizen annotations, and comments on Talk.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to identify volunteer types.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to preclassify the Galaxy Zoo images using simple low-level image features.
Action: Use Low, Simple Level Image Features

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect Snapshot Serengeti images with no classifiable animals in them.
Action: Detect Snapshot Serengeti Images With No Classifiable Animals In

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic image series detection for the case of timestamping malfunction in Snapshot Serengeti images.
Action: Perform Automatic Image Series Detection For The Case Timestamping Malfunction In Snapshot Serengeti Images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic animal species preclassification in Snapshot Serengeti.
Action: Perform Automatic Animal Species Preclassification In Snapshot Serengeti

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic animal attribute preclassification in Snapshot Serengeti.
Action: Perform Automatic Animal Attribute Preclassification In Snapshot Serengeti

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic animal number detection in Snapshot Serengeti.
Action: Perform Automatic Animal Number Detection In Snapshot Serengeti

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic segmentation or localization of plankton in Plankton Portal.
Action: Perform Automatic Segmentation In Plankton Portal

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect Plankton Portal images with no classifiable plankton in them.
Action: Detect Plankton Portal Images With No Classifiable Plankton In

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic detection of plankton size or orientation in Plankton Portal images.
Action: Perform Automatic Detection Of Plankton Size In Plankton Portal Images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic preclassification of plankton species in Plankton Portal images.
Action: Perform Automatic Preclassification Of Plankton Species In Plankton Portal Images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform automatic worm motion analysis to reduce video duration in Worm Watch Lab.
Action: Reduce Video Duration In Worm Watch Lab

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to automatically detect the time in a Worm Watch Lab video where the worm lays an egg.
Action: Detect The Time In A Worm Watch Lab Video The Worm Where Lays An Egg

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to detect important features such as areas of flooding, damage, temporary shelters, blocked roads etc in the satellite images.
Action: Detect Important Features Such As Areas Of Flooding
Detect Important Features Such As Areas Of Damage
Detect Important Features Such As Areas Of Temporary Shelter

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to assess the probability/weight of a volunteer's classification based on their experience.
Action: Assess The Probability Of A Volunteer

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to perform prefiltering of the images to remove artefacts such as bright stars and camera read errors.
Action: Remove Artefacts Such As Bright Stars

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to detect moving and transient objects in the images.
Action: Detect Moving Objects In The Images

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to remove background noise and distracting sounds from the audio files.
Action: Distracting Background Noise Sounds From The Audio Files

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to identify the number of whales heard in a single audio file.
Action: Identify The Number Of Whales In A Audio, Single File

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when I should interrupt a volunteer.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know whether I should interrupt a volunteer with text, an image, or a video.
Action: Interrupt A Volunteer With An Image
Interrupt A Volunteer With A Video

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when I should educate a volunteer.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know whether I should educate a volunteer with text, an image, or a video.
Action: Educate A Volunteer With A Video
Educate A Volunteer With An Image

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know which piece of education I should give to a volunteer.
Action: Which Piece Of Education Give To A Volunteer

Text: #G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when a volunteer has made an interesting comment on a subject.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when Zoonibot should comment on a subject.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know when Zoonibot should give an explanation.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to know what Zoonibot should say to a volunteer.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to group subjects by similarity.
#G28# As a Zooniverse admin, I want to recommend different projects to volunteers based on their previous experiences.
Action: Recommend Different Projects To Volunteers On Previous Experiences

Text: #G28# As an admin, I want to see a summary of articles, so that I reuse them.
